text: Tamagra nahigeta Nagrira nagesga nosuta, Nagri navurera antri nehuta korora huta tamarena noraze. Nagra Ra Anumzamo'na hagerina tro hute'na, hagerimo'a amare eme tregahie hu'na mevava avame zana kahepa ante'na, evu'noankino ana isagana timo'a agatereno ovugahie. Hagi hagerimo'a kranto kranto huno ne-eno rekazarino ra ageru runo egahianagi, anama ante'noa isagana agate oregahie.
